page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {Entertainment}is well provided for the people of {Biggar} by the {Theatre {Workshop.} The Theatre Workshop provides two main forms of Entertainment Plays and Films. Of these perhaps the Film shows have suffered the most in recent years due to the introduction of the video.The plays are very popular and they are usually amateur ,but of a very high standard.The one that attracts most attention is the Christmas Pantomime.Apart from the Theatre Workshop there is the {Biggar Music {Club};this has an excellent reputation for getting good artistes from the world of Classical Music. There is some entertainment in the form of Dicos for the teenagers,but there probably is room for improvement here.
